survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the key barriers preventing consumers from adopting electric vehicles (EVs) and their preferences for future EV models.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) in the next 5 years?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) in the next 5 years?

questions.question_text: What are the top 3 barriers preventing you from purchasing an EV? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Range anxiety (worries about running out of charge)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select with a maximum of 3 options. Include an 'Other' field for additional insights.
